thread.title: Facebook launches Parse IoT SDKs for Atmel, Broadcom, Intel, and TI hardware
thread.title_full: Facebook launches Parse IoT SDKs for Atmel, Broadcom, Intel, and TI hardware - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook launches Parse IoT SDKs for Atmel, Broadcom, Intel, and TI hardware
text: Parse, Facebook’s mobile app development platform, is announcing today the availability of new software development kits (SDKs) for more types of Internet-connected devices. Now there are SDKs for hardware containing processors from Atmel, Broadcom, Intel, and TI. “Now, it’s easier than ever to use Parse with even more types of hardware and a broader range […] »
